title: Mini lamingtons
ingredients: ['For the sponge', '6 eggs, separated', '250g caster sugar', '125g margarine', '200g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', 'For the chocolate icing', '100g caster sugar', '50g margarine', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '2 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons vanilla sugar', '50g desiccated coconut']
